name: Dismantled (Team Toom)
description:
You were destroyed, dismantled.
Now you must try and find your missing body parts and with them - your lost abilities. 

A short, but rather difficult, action adventure game.
Best played with a gamepad controller (Joysticks make it less impossible).

Controls:

Hop / Dash – A / B (Keyboard: Space / Shift)

Movement - Left Stick (Keyboard: Arrows / WASD)

Good luck.

Made in less than 48 hours in the Global Game Jam 2020 by:
Ido Leshem, Danny Marcowitz & Dor Nevo.
